title: Warranty Service
description: Comprehensive coverage for repairs and replacements.
details: All gadgets come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Covers defects and malfunctions under normal usage conditions.
eligibility: All gadgets purchased from Gadgets Heaven
terms: Warranty void if device is damaged due to misuse or unauthorized repairs.

title: Guarantee Policy
details: If you are not satisfied with your product, return it within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.
eligibility: Applies to all products in unused condition
terms: Product must be returned in original packaging and in sellable condition.

title: Extended Warranty
description: Option to extend warranty coverage for up to 3 years.
details: Choose between 1, 2, or 3-year extended warranties to safeguard your gadget against future issues.
terms: Extended warranty is non-refundable and cannot be transferred to another device.

title: Customer Support
description: 24/7 customer support for all products and services.
details: Our team is available around the clock to assist you with any product issues or inquiries.
terms: Support is limited to inquiries related to purchased products.

title: Insurance Plans
description: Comprehensive gadget insurance to cover accidental damage.
details: Choose from basic, standard, or premium plans to protect against accidental drops, spills, and theft.
eligibility: All devices in good working condition
terms: Insurance does not cover intentional damage or loss.

title: Product Installation
description: Professional setup and installation of your new gadget.
details: Our team provides installation and setup for complex gadgets, ensuring a smooth experience from day one.
terms: Installation must be scheduled within 14 days of purchase.

title: Tech Support Membership
description: Exclusive membership for priority tech support.
details: With a membership, enjoy priority access to tech support, special discounts, and on-site assistance.
terms: Membership is non-refundable and renews annually unless canceled.

title: Product Exchange
details: Easily exchange your product within 30 days of purchase if it fails to meet your expectations.
terms: Product must be returned in original packaging. Only one exchange allowed per product.

title: Recycling Program
description: Eco-friendly recycling options for old gadgets.
details: Dispose of your old devices responsibly through our recycling program and earn loyalty points.
eligibility: Applies to old and non-functional gadgets
terms: Recycling is only available for specific gadget categories.

title: Repair Service
description: Professional repair services for out-of-warranty gadgets.
details: Our skilled technicians provide repairs for a range of issues, from screen replacements to battery replacements.
terms: Prices vary based on parts and labor. Warranty is not extended after repairs.
